programme.title: Aberdeen Standard Investments Scottish Open Day 4 2020
programme.desc: Xander Schauffele won the Scottish Open with a level-par 70, securing victory despite a shaky front nine and birdies on 14 and 16, finishing ahead of Kurt Kitayama and Joohyung Kim

programme.title: Abrdn Scottish Open Highlights Show 2021
programme.desc: Min Woo Lee won the 2021 Abrdn Scottish Open at 18-under, sealing victory in a playoff at Renaissance.

programme.title: Callaway Tour Tips: Min Woo Lee and Detry
programme.desc: The European Tour and Callaway present 'Tour Tips' with Min Woo Lee and Thomas Detry on driver speed.

programme.title: Tour Pros Play Mini Golf: Rose vs Horschel
programme.desc: Justin Rose vs. Billy Horschel in a thrilling 8-hole battle!

programme.title: Aberdeen Standard Investments Scottish Open Highlights Show 2019
programme.desc: Bernd Wiesberger stole the title after a tense play off with Aaron Rai

programme.title: Genesis Scottish Open Day 4 2023
programme.desc: Rory McIlroy won the 2023 Scottish Open at 15-under, securing his first title of the year by two shots.

programme.title: BMW International Open Day 4 2025
programme.desc: Dan Brown secured an emotional two shot victory to lift the 2025 BMW International Open trophy.

programme.title: Every shot of Rory McIlroy's Final Round HDDC 2025
programme.desc: Every shot that was televised of Rory McIlroy's final round 66 at the 2025 HDDC.
